subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Judge orders Libby jailed during appeal

06/14/07 01:49 PM, EDT
A federal judge on Thursday ordered I. Lewis "Scooter" Libby to report to prison while his attorneys appeal his perjury and obstruction convictions.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Groups call on Canada to bring home Gitmo prisoner

06/14/07 01:34 PM, EDT
Human rights groups on Thursday accused Canada of not doing enough to press the United States in the case of a Canadian who has been held at the U.S. prison for terror suspects in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
FULL STORY
